groupbuilder.groupcalculator module

class groupbuilder.groupcalculator.GroupCalculator(amount_people, group_size)[source]

Bases: GroupCalculatorInterface

_abc_impl = <_abc._abc_data object>
can_repeat()[source]

Calculates the maximum number of unique groups that can be created. :return int: The maximum number of unique groups.

Return type:

int

create_groups()[source]

Creates the groups, based on the round. Avoids usage of the same person in the same group. :rtype: None :return: None

get_all_groups(pyd=False)[source]

Gets all the groups. :return dict: All the groups.

Return type:

dict

get_current_groups(pyd=False)[source]

Gets the current groups. :return dict: The current groups.

Return type:

dict

reset_groups()[source]

Reset the groups and round to be initial. :rtype: None :return: None

select_csv_file(file_path)[source]

Selects the students from a CSV file. :type file_path: str :param file_path: The path to the CSV file. :rtype: dict :return: The column indexes and column names to choose from.

select_from_csv_file(has_header_row, student_firstname_col, student_lastname_col)[source]

Selects the students from a CSV file. :type has_header_row: bool :param has_header_row: If the CSV file has a header row. :type student_firstname_col: Union[int, str] :param student_firstname_col: The column index or name of the student first name. :type student_lastname_col: Union[int, str, None] :param student_lastname_col: The column index or name of the student last name. :rtype: None :return: None

visualize_groups()[source]

Print the groups in a readable format. :rtype: None :return: None
